bug.author: nicholasprayogo
bug.summary: DeepAR on Solar Energy dataset gives NRMSE > 1
bug.description: after training for 40 epochs, DeepAR model still gives me NRMSE of about 1.03 although ND is reasonable (about 0.51). Why is NRMSE > 1? Possible bug? Compared the results with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/blob/master/evaluations/solar-energy/DeepAREstimator.json>https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/blob/master/evaluations/solar-energy/DeepAREstimator.json</denchmark-link> and it matches, but NRMSE isn't provided. This only happens on solar energy dataset specifically.
